title: ADD_MINIMAP_OVERLAY
content:
0x4AFD2499// AddMinimapOverlay
int ADD_MINIMAP_OVERLAY(char* name);Parameters:name: The path to a .gfx file in the current resource. It has to be specified as a file.Returns: A minimap overlay ID.Loads a minimap overlay from a GFx file in the current resource.If you need to control the depth of overlay use ADD_MINIMAP_OVERLAY_WITH_DEPTH.
